name: Lust Element - Season 1
description:
Start your intergalactic adventure as a captain of a slapdash assembled team aboard a mining spaceship. Though it begins as an easy mission to earn quick money, you'll quickly realize that you've got involved in something much bigger...



On your journey, you'll face mysteries, traps, and dangerous enemies. Luckily, you're not alone! Gather a crew of different skills and talents to ensure your adventure is successful and pleasant.





The universe of Lust Element has various alien species, both primitive and far more advanced than humans. On your journey, you'll get a chance to meet and get to know them better. Will this alien girl gift you a night of pleasure or a poisoned dart in your neck? You'll never know before you try it!



Soon after the first mission goes wrong, you'll realize you're involved in a big intergalactic political game. Those who put you on a board think that you're a pawn, but make your moves wisely and rise to be one of the main players.
